snippet: Izhar Patkin, once a major player in the New York art scene but hardly seen in years, has a new overtly political exhibition at the Jewish Museum in Manhattan.
abstract: Excerpts from a conversation with artist Izhar Patkin, whose solo show Izhar Patkin: The Messiah’s glAss is on view at the Jewish Museum.
lead_paragraph: Izhar Patkin, once a major player in the New York art scene but hardly seen in years, has a new overtly political exhibition at the Jewish Museum in Manhattan.

headline.seo: Izhar Patkin Back in the New York Art Scene at Jewish Museum
headline.main: In His Narrative, Time to Get Back ‘Into the Game’
headline.print_headline: In His Narrative, Time to Get Back ‘Into the Game’
